title: vishNu vallabha
sahitya:
viSNu vallabha virUpAkSAvEda rUpa vimala saccidAnanda

anupallavi

 jiSNu pUjita trinayana varada cidambara cidvilAsa tEjOmaya vigrahA

caraNam

 pankaja bhavAdi sura pUjita pada pankajahita shashivahni nEtrapaNi
kankaNa purahara kAmAntaka shivashankara harikEsha mAm pAlaya
